item.description:
Most people attending Park Serve Day will meet at the East Entrance. Those who would rather work on trails can meet at the above location. The trail from Federal Pond Road to Howland Road will be cleared. At the Howland Road end an effort will be made to stop erosion caused by dirt bikes. As this is a remote area we may drive in to Howland Road with tools. If we get a good turnout a short trail from Lower College Pond Road and Torrey Pond Road going toward Lot 2 (Gate 30) will be improved.

 

Please bring  rakes, shovels, loppers, etc. DCR is supplying gloves. 

 

Breakfast snacks provided.
item.how_to_find_us: Location: MSSF, Lower College Pond Road at Federal Pond Road, Plymouth MA
item.why: Trails need work too! Thom has organized a second Park Serve Day work party for people who would like to help restore trails.

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: Park Serve Day Trail Work Party
